author: Bernhard List
description: A cocktail to appeal to those who appreciate bittersweet flavours.
name: Capitano
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
